page.title: 16Orchards Caravan Park
page.content: {28 people}work on the site in the summer. There are receptionists, ground staff, maintenance staff and shop assistants. 5 people are employed through the winter. Some{Island people}come here for their main holiday.The site is among beautiful scenery and is very peaceful. The{Wight Heritage Trail}- an 85 mile route linking footpaths and bridleways passes here. There is room for 800-1000 people and there were 800 people during the {Sprihg Bank Holiday}at the end of May. It is necessary to book in advance to stay here. Mr. Paplow advertises in the{Isle of Wight}guide and at caravan exnibitions.
